mapper.select: SELECT G.GOODS_NUM , G.GOODS_TITLE , G.GOODS_IMG_TITLE , G.GOODS_COST , U.USER_NICK FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY GOODS_DATE DESC) AS RN , GOODS_NUM , GOODS_TITLE , GOODS_IMG_TITLE , KIND_NUM , GOODS_COST , USER_NUM FROM GOODS WHERE GOODS_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' ) G , USER_INFO U WHERE G.USER_NUM = U.USER_NUM AND CEIL(RN/5) = 1
SELECT KIND_NUM , KIND_NAME FROM GOODS_KIND WHERE KIND_NAME LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%'

SELECT B.BOARD_NUM , B.USER_NUM , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_CONTENT , B.BOARD_REGDATE , B.BOARD_READCOUNT , B.BOARD_NOTICE , U.USER_NICK FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BOARD_REGDATE DESC) AS RN , BOARD_NUM , USER_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_REGDATE , BOARD_READCOUNT , BOARD_NOTICE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' ) B , USER_INFO U WHERE B.USER_NUM = U.USER_NUM AND CEIL(B.RN/5) = 1
